project.name: MusicRecital AppFuse Web Application
project.description:
This project was created to build community around local amateur musicians and listeners in their communities. This application may provide means for amateur musicians to perform and play live without the interference of commercial promoters and third-party music people trying to wedge themselves in between the players that just want to play and the listeners that just want to hear good music. The music industry is very difficult to break into. The mission of this project is to bring a little freshness to the local music communities and help people realize that our musical tastes don't have to be dictated by record labels. Independent musicians may find this application and it's community very helpful if they are touring and want to find places to crash, people to meet, and even fill-in musicians for local venues. Basic membership at MusicRecital.org will always be free.
The site at MusicRecital.org will be used to host a prototype release for demonstration. Kickstarter.com will be used to secure strong hosting when the Java web application is ready for the public to use.
Currently (as of December 5, 2014), this project is under-development of the alpha (prototype) release of version 1.0 and is being built as version 1.0-SNAPSHOT. At such time the project is nearing release of the prototype, the version for release will be 1.0.0-alpha-1.
